entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:16 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.6°C
Wind: SSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle this evening and 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening and developing after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
